rules_text:
Kicker {1}{G} and/or {1}{U} [i](You may pay an additional {1}{G} and/or {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
If Thetavolver was kicked with its {1}{G} kicker, it enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
If Thetavolver was kicked with its {1}{U} kicker, when it enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand.
